meanings.sent1: The swamp was oosy after the heavy rain.
meanings.sent2: The muddy ground felt oosy under my feet.
meanings.sent3: The oosy mud made squelching sounds as we walked through it.
meanings.sent4: Her oosy hands left a trail of dirt on the clean floor.
meanings.sent5: The oosy texture of the slime was unpleasant to touch.

meanings.sent1: The oosy substance dripped slowly from the leaky pipe.
meanings.sent2: The oosy smell of decay filled the air in the old cellar.
meanings.sent3: The oosy liquid bubbled up from the ground like a tiny volcano.
meanings.sent4: The oosy mess was difficult to clean up from the floor.
meanings.sent5: The oosy ooze seeped out of the cracks in the wall.

meanings.sent1: The oosy ground gave way under our weight.
meanings.sent2: Her shoes sank into the oosy mud along the riverbank.
meanings.sent3: The oosy fabric of the blanket absorbed the spilled drink quickly.
meanings.sent4: The oosy texture of the pudding made it a favorite dessert.
meanings.sent5: The oosy feeling of the wet sand between my toes was soothing.
